### Charter Boat Mission Mackerel Egg

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-5528-32057051
* **Solicitation Number**: 30004286
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-07, 13:00:00 (UTC)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-06-12
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-03-31

#### Tender Purpose

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a Contractor to provide a fishing vessel and accompanying crew to conduct an ichthyoplankton (fish eggs and larvae) research survey in the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Organization (NAFO) zones 4R, 3Pns, in July 2023.

#### Survey Details

The survey will support fisheries research into the abundance and distribution of Atlantic mackerel eggs and larvae outside of their main spawning site in the southern Gulf of Saint Lawrence (GSL; NAFO 4T). The survey will encompass a total period of 10–12 consecutive days in early July, starting no later than July 10th, 2023. Loading of equipment and reception of the science staff will take place and end in Gaspé, Q.C. Survey operations will be directed by DFO staff on board the survey vessel and will occur in Canadian territorial waters within the NAFO zones 4R, 4T, 4Vn, 3Pn, and 3Ps.

#### Vessel Requirements

The Survey Vessel must be a mid-shore or offshore fishing vessel (over 60 ft.) capable of station holding and of towing the survey sampling gear (i.e., Bongo nets) at a defined speed of 2.5–3.5 knots. The vessel and crew must be able to conduct operations around the clock (24-hour days).

#### Selection Criteria

The selection criteria for this tender are based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.
